name: Twitter Virtual Art Gallery
description:
Welcome to the Twitter Virtual Art Gallery: a truly unique place to admire art!

The Gallery fetches recent art tweets, and puts a random five pieces on display before your eyes! And once you're ready to move on, just walk through the tunnel opposite the artwork and when you re-enter the gallery you'll get 5 more pieces!

Controls:

L = Toggle Display Lights (on/off)

O = Toggle Display Lights' Intensity (high/low)

K = Toggle Room Lights.

Customising searches: The default search terms are "#furryart" and "#furryartist". Once the game has been ran once, you can change these, adding and removing whatever terms you want by:

1. Press the Windows Key and the "R" Key at the same time.

2. Type "%AppData%" and hit enter.

3. Navigate to the folder called "Simmo", then "ArtGallery" and open "searchTags.txt"

4. Edit away! Place each tag on a new line though!

Note about NSFW content: By default, the Gallery won't show anything that Twitter classes as "Possibly Sensitive"., as well as tweets including common NFSW terms (e.g. "Sex" and "P**n" and so on...) This (should) include most NSFW content. If you wish for "Possibly Sensitive" content to be included, add the following tags to the search terms:

1. Add ".allownsfw" to allow NSFW content

2. Add ".allowswears" to allow bad language
